DOC.brief_summary: In controlled trial , patient tetralogy Fallot randomize either interval training , continuous training , usual care group .
DOC.brief_title: Exercise Training Adults With Corrected Tetralogy Fallot
DOC.detailed_description: Patients surgical correction tetralogy Fallot ( cTF ) impair exercise tolerance compare healthy age-matched individual . In controlled trial , patient cTF randomize either interval training , continuous training , usual care . The aim study compare effect interval vs. continuous exercise training : ) exercise capacity ii ) vascular function iii ) arrhythmogenic potential iv ) parameter inflammation , hemostasis heart failure severity v ) health-related quality life adult cTF
DOC.criteria: congenital tetralogy Fallot surgically correct childhood contraindication exercise training , uncontrolled dysrhythmias , uncontrolled heart failure ( New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) stage IV ) , unstable coronary arterial disease , intellectual development disorder , pregnancy .
